Lucas and Jenny soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when they become trapped in a battle between their Homeowners Association and an onslaught of monsters from hell. The horror-comedy takes the timely concern of home-ownership and wraps this up in an entertaining action-packed thrill ride. Based on a story by Scott Hawkins. It's produced by Matt Dodd, Luke Williams, Tim Reis, Julian Smith. This is premiering at the 2025 Fantasia Film Festival in Montreal this summer.
